Entries.Herbert: A gift? And an expensive one at that. Thank you. I like this a lot./348 336 434 163 166 72/I quite like it. I'll accept this./60 62 64 66 68 70/I highly doubt this is an acceptable gift./80 330/This is absoloutely disgusting and offensive./2 16 22 24 78 222/A present? Okay. Thanks. I can put this somewhere.$1/-4/

Entries.Herbert0: I wanted to get you the most expensive ring, darling. But your pendant but that diamond to shame.$3
Entries.Herbert1: Please let me know if you have any second thoughts, my dear.$3

Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Herbert... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and husband!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Herbert... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Herbert in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Herbert in the bonds of marriage.

Entries.Herbert: All this delicious food... I must have some sent back to the school when it re-opens.$7
A new year! Thank goodness I never left back to the school. I get to spend my life here with you.$4
How flattering.$1#$e#Although I have a talent for many things, dancing is not one of them.$1#$e#How sweet of you to ask, however.$7
Do have fun today. If you decide to dance I'll be supporting you from the sidelines.$3
I must say, the Governor is a strange chap. Intriguing. I must get to know him better.$7#$e#Whenever he'd come here in previous years I paid no attention to him.$1
Entries.Herbert_spouse: I didn't fail to notice the amount of crops on our farm. Perhaps you could add something to the soup?$3

Entries.Herbert: I'm very tempted to write something about those jellies. Inspiring, aren't they?$9
Entries.Herbert_spouse: Evening dear. If you get cold I brought us some blankets.$4

Entries.Herbert: How intriguing... those glowing Jellies. I must ask my Grandfather more about them.$7
This fair is ridiculous. That clown obviously isn't paid enough.$5
Entries.Herbert_spouse: Welcome dear. I might head home early - I'm not fond of this festival.

Entries.Herbert: I honestly do wish that clown would find a better job.$1
I'm truely horrified by this place. Those skeletons aren't real...$2#$e#Right?$6#$b#Well, at least being lost in this maze means I don't have to face them.$1
I brought a few extra scarves. You won't catch me with a cold any time soon.$7#$b#Also, I noticed this strange snow-creature. It's very amusing.$3
My favourite time of year. I must not forget to write to my parents this Christmas.$3#$e#Do you write to your parents at Christmas?
You don't need to get me a present. You're worth far more than anything expensive.$4

Entries.Herbertshome.1: Herbert's childhood teddy. His name is Little Merp!
Entries.Herbertshome.2: Dear Herbert,^We received your letter about your rejection from Vanedale Prep and are writing to you from Washington.^We would like you to know that we are extremely disappointed in you.^How dare you disrespect our family name in such a way. However, your father will fix this little issue.^I'm sure making an inquiry at work will sort things out.^But at times like these we wish we never had a son. -Your parents.
Entries.Herbertshome.3: His fridge is full of exotic foods. The smell is mouth-watering.
Entries.Herbertshome.4: It's a study book all about Law. It hasn't been touched in a while. Some pages are ripped out.
Entries.Herbertshome.5: The radio station is tuned into the news.
Entries.Herbertshome.6: A family photograph! Herbert is a child here, and stood next to two very scary looking people. A woman with short black hair and a man whose bald.
Entries.Herbertsproperty.2: I wonder if Herbert uses this often. I didn't think Herbert would ever enjoy star-gazing.
Entries.Herbertsproperty.3: What a cute plant! Herbert must be taking care of it well.
Entries.Herbertsproperty.4: Herbert's been gardening when he's not studying.
Entries.Herbertsproperty.5: Herbert's mailbox. There's an envelope in here. The writing is extremely curly.
Entries.Herbertsproperty.6: The small beach below is littered with rubbish. I hope none of this is Herbert's.
Entries.Herbertsproperty.7: A little deck chair! Herbert likes to sit and write here in the summer.
Entries.Herbertsproperty.8: Herbert's favourite place to sit and read. Apparently this tree has been here for decades.
Entries.Herbertsproperty.9: Lewis gave this house to Herbert as a gift for his birthday since Herbert wanted his own place to spend summers in Pelican Town.
Entries.Herbertsproperty.10: An empty plant pot. Herbert will be planting something here soon.
Entries.HerbertSpouseRoom.1: A pile of unopened envelopes that Herbert left here. They all have different handwriting. They must be from his relatives.
Entries.HerbertSpouseRoom.2: A footstool so Herbert can reach his high-up bookshelf. How cute!
Entries.HerbertSpouseRoom.3: Post-it notes which all have different reminders on.^Pink: Remember to write back to relatives and thank for condolences etc.^Yellow: Remember to take back library books.^Blue: Remember to set schedule for visiting Lewis.
Entries.HerbertSpouseRoom.4: Now that he's decided not to become a lawyer, Herbert can let his gardening aspiration flourish.

Entries.give_flowersA: Oh my...$6#$b#Do you really... you're in love with me?$6#$b#I didn't know! I had no idea that you loved me just as much as I loved you.$6#$b#Thank you, so much. I've never felt like this before.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: I promise to take care of you and love you every single day.$4#$e#You're the most important thing to me in the world.$4
Entries.give_pendant: You really... want to spend the rest of your life with me?$4#$b#You - you love me enough to want me?$4#$b#No one's ever... no one's ever wanted that with me before.$2#$b#I accept! I'll ask my Grandfather for his blessing. Do your parents know about us? Should we ask for their blessing?$4#$b#Our wedding will be arranged for three days in time!$4
Entries.stardrop_gift: I would give you anything you ever asked for. Here's a token of my adoration for you. You really are everything to me, darling.$4
Entries.reject_two_heartA: @, we are mere acquaintances. I do not think of you like that. I apologise for hurting your feelings.$1
Entries.reject_two_heartB: We are hardly friends. I'm very sorry, but I'm not interested in you.$1
Entries.reject_four_heartA: Oh...$1#$b#I didn't expect this.$1#$b#@ dear, you're my friend. I-I apologise for giving you false signals.$1
Entries.reject_four_heartB: @ you're my friend. I'd hate to ruin our companionship.$1
Entries.engageA: I do hope something has affected your current mental state, because you have failed to forget you are ENGAGED.$5#$b#Did you hear me correctly? ENGAGED.$5#$b#So you're the unfaithful type it seems.$5
Entries.engageB: I never took you for the unfaithful type.$5#$b#True colours shine through don't they?$5
Entries.marriedA: I recently went to lunch with %spouse, and you were all they could talk about.$5#$b#How DARE you ask for something like this!$5
Entries.marriedB: Your spouse deserves far better than someone as unfaithful as you.$5
Entries.refusal_knownA: I adore your company, but I am not ready to take the next step yet.$1
Entries.refusal_knownB: I'd hate to make a rushed mistake. I would never want to ruin our relationship.$1
Entries.refusal_botherA: Please slow down. This is far too fast.$
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: My goodness - you are absoloutely insane!$6#$b#I was intending to get to know you but perhaps I'd rather stay away.$6#$b#Far... far away.$1
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Please tell me this is some sort of twisted humor that you have.$1

Entries.give_flowersA: Thank you my darling!$4#$b#How kind of you!$4
Entries.give_flowersB: This is beyond endearing. I love you too.$4
Entries.give_pendant: My dear, I hope you're feeling okay. You do remember proposing, right?$1
Entries.engageA: We are engaged my darling. It's okay, you don't need to propose again.$3
Entries.engageB: No need, I still proudly have my other pendant.

Entries.give_flowersA: No one has ever made me happier. Thank you.$4
Entries.marriedA: Hm? Oh! Haha. You're a strange one, my dear.$4

Entries.958599/f Herbert 1000/t 1300 1500/w sunn: playful/39 11/farmer 49 12 3 Herbert 40 11 1 Gunther 37 107 1/skippable/pause 500/speak Herbert "So you got my letter! Oh good! I'm grateful that you wanted to come meet me.$3"/pause 100/move farmer -8 0 3/pause 50/move farmer 0 -1 3/pause 200/speak Herbert "I got some books from the library for us to read together. And I was hoping perhaps you could teach me a little about farming?#$b#Then I can teach you a little about what I learn!$3"/pause 200/speak Herbert "Deal?$4"/pause 300/emote farmer 20/pause 100/textAboveHead Herbert "Great!"/pause 500/speak Herbert "Shall we begin?"/question fork1 "#Alright, only that I forgot my gardening book. Can we pick it up at the library?#I didn't know I had to bring books."/fork rejection/friendship Herbert 250/pause 500/speak Herbert "You forgot to bring a book to a reading session?$1#$b#Okay, it's fine. We can go to the library - I have some books to drop off anyways."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap ArchaeologyHouse/warp farmer 4 10/warp Herbert 5 10/warp Gunther 3 8 2/viewport 4 10 true/positionOffset farmer 0 10/pause 500/faceDirection Herbert 3/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Herbert "Okay, let's find the farming section.#$b#You know where it is, right?"/pause 50/faceDirection Herbert 1/pause 500/move Herbert 3 0 1/move Herbert 0 2 1/pause 200/speak Herbert "'A guide to game modding' Well this won't help us at all, will it?"/pause 100/move Herbert 0 1 1/pause 500/speak Herbert "'Gaming effects - what too much Gaming can do to you' You know I'm starting to think I'm in the wrong section.$1"/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 0/pause 500/speak Gunther "What can I do for you today, @? Have any new artifacts to bring in or looking for a specific book?"/pause 200/speak Gunther "'Gardening and farming books'! Why, shouldn't I be asking you that question?$1#$b#Those books are on the back bottom shelves."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 500/viewport move 10 -6 900/move farmer 5 0 1/pause 50/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 50/move farmer 7 0 1/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/speak Herbert "Have you found them @?"/pause 200/move farmer 2 0 0/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 0/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Herbert "You found them? Great!$3"/pause 50/move Herbert 0 -8 0/pause 50/move Herbert 7 0 1/pause 50/faceDirection Herbert 0/pause 200/textAboveHead Herbert "Good."/pause 500/speak Herbert "Okay, let's borrow it, come along."/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/move Herbert -7 0 1/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap Forest/warp farmer 49 12/warp Herbert 53 12/warp Gunther 13 55/viewport 40 10 true/pause 500/move farmer -7 0 3/move Herbert -12 0 3/move farmer 0 -2 2/move Herbert 0 -2 2/pause 200/emote farmer 20/speak Herbert "Well, what are we waiting for?$3#$b#Come sit.$3"/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Herbert 1/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "You spend the rest of the afternoon with Herbert, reading and discussing topics. He is pleasantly surprised that you know what he's talking about most of the time."/pause 1000/end
Entries.rejection: pause 500/textAboveHead Herbert "Uhm. What."/pause 200/speak Herbert "You, uhm... you didn't know you had to bring books?$1#$b#But that's the whole point of a study session...$1"/pause 200/emote Herbert 28/pause 200/speak Herbert "Perhaps I should have been more specific... or maybe I should have known you can't read properly...$1#$b#It's fine. Let's pick some up at the library for you."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap ArchaeologyHouse/warp farmer 4 10/warp Herbert 5 10/warp Gunther 3 8 2/viewport 4 10 true/positionOffset farmer 0 10/pause 500/faceDirection Herbert 3/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Herbert "Okay, let's find the farming section.#$b#You know where it is, right?"/pause 50/faceDirection Herbert 1/pause 500/move Herbert 3 0 1/move Herbert 0 2 1/pause 200/speak Herbert "'A guide to game modding' Well this won't help us at all, will it?"/pause 100/move Herbert 0 1 1/pause 500/speak Herbert "'Gaming effects - what too much Gaming can do to you' You know I'm starting to think I'm in the wrong section.$1"/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 0/pause 500/speak Gunther "What can I do for you today, @? Have any new artifacts to bring in or looking for a specific book?"/pause 200/speak Gunther "'Gardening and farming books'! Why, shouldn't I be asking you that question?$1#$b#Those books are on the back bottom shelves."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 500/viewport move 10 -6 900/move farmer 5 0 1/pause 50/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 50/move farmer 7 0 1/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/speak Herbert "Have you found them @?"/pause 200/move farmer 2 0 0/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 0/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Herbert "You found them? Great!$3"/pause 50/move Herbert 0 -8 0/pause 50/move Herbert 7 0 1/pause 50/faceDirection Herbert 0/pause 200/textAboveHead Herbert "Good."/pause 500/speak Herbert "Okay, let's borrow it, come along."/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/move Herbert -7 0 1/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap Forest/warp farmer 49 12/warp Herbert 53 12/warp Gunther 13 55/viewport 40 10 true/pause 500/move farmer -7 0 3/move Herbert -12 0 3/move farmer 0 -2 2/move Herbert 0 -2 2/pause 200/emote farmer 20/speak Herbert "Well, what are we waiting for?$3#$b#Come sit.$3"/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Herbert 1/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "You spend the rest of the afternoon with Herbert, reading and discussing topics. He is pleasantly surprised that you know what he's talking about most of the time."/pause 1000/end

Entries.967211/f Herbert 500/t 900 1300/w sunny: jaunty/28 4/farmer 38 1 2 Herbert 27 4 2 Willy 87 40 2/skippable/showFrame Herbert 31/pause 200/move farmer 0 4 2/move farmer -11 0 0/pause 500/speak Herbert "@? Oh hello! For a moment I thought you were someone else.$3#$b#What brings you here today? Relaxing by the beach after a day's work?"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Herbert "Well, I don't usually pick the beach to have a good study session - the sand gets everywhere, I'm afraid.$1#$b#I've been waiting for Willy for the past half an hour. He's late.#$b#So I've decided to simply do some light reading while I wait.$3"/pause 500/move farmer 1 0 3/move farmer 0 -1 3/pause 500/speak Herbert "Say, can I ask you a question, @? I need a second opinion.#$b#I'm thinking of writing a book. I was, personally, thinking of writing a textbook about physics. What do you think?"/question fork1 "#You should definitely write a book about something you like. If physics is the subject for you, do it!#How about a novel of some kind? It could be like sci-fi or maybe adventure?"/fork adventure/pause 500/speak Herbert "Well, thank you. You've made up my mind!$3#$b#Ah, hm. Let's see. I'll call it 'An insight to Physics - For Beginners'. How does that sound?$3"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 200/speak Herbert "Well then, speaking of, I did bring some spare paper. Perhaps I should get started. Now, help me out with the introduction. I don't want to sound too formal, but also not too informal.#$b#This book writing is challenging stuff.$1"/pause 200/showFrame Herbert 26/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 700/emote Herbert 56/pause 100/speak Herbert "Aha! How does this sound as an introduction.$3#$b#*clears throat*$1#$b#'The world of Physics is a challenging place. That's why I have decided to write a book about it.'"/pause 200/emote farmer 36/speak Herbert "Yes? No? Oh - no? Okay I'll try again.$1"/pause 200/warp Willy 26 21/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/speak Herbert "Hmm? What is it?"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 200/showFrame Herbert 0/pause 100/emote Herbert 32/move Willy 0 -14 0/move Willy 1 0 0/pause 200/speak Herbert "Ah! Willy! You took your time, didn't you chap?$3"/pause 100/emote Willy 16/pause 300/speak Willy "Sorry about that, Herbert. I was chasing this huge fish - a real whopper. Some oversized trout. You should have seen it!$1#$b#Oh, hello @! Didn't see you there.$1#$b#Anyways, he brought me into much deeper waters than I meant to go. Sorry about how long it took to get back.$2"/pause 200/speak Herbert "Oh don't worry about it, you're here now! Are you ready to head back into the sea?$3"/pause 200/speak Willy "Never been more ready.$1#$b#I'll see you later, @. I see you were keeping Herbert company.$1"/pause 200/faceDirection Herbert 1/speak Herbert "Goodbye, @. Thanks for helping me with my book!"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 20/move Willy 0 13 2/faceDirection farmer 2/move Herbert 0 13 2/pause 200/speak Herbert "I'll be back from the fishing trip in a few hours, @. I'll see you then!$3"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.adventure: pause 200/speak Herbert "Oh no no, definitely not. I may have a love for literature but I'd never attempt writing my own novel.$1#$b#You don't seem to know me very well, do you?$1"/pause 200/speak Herbert "No matter, you can help me write my Physics textbook instead.$3"/pause 100/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speak Herbert "Well then, speaking of, I did bring some spare paper. I should get started. Now, help me out with the introduction. I don't want to sound too formal, but also not too informal.#$b#This book writing is challenging stuff.$1"/pause 200/showFrame Herbert 27/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 700/emote Herbert 56/pause 100/speak Herbert "Aha! How does this sound as an introduction.$3#$b#*clears throat*$1#$b#'The world of Physics is a challenging place. That's why I have decided to write a book about it.'"/pause 200/emote farmer 36/speak Herbert "Yes? No? Oh - no? Okay I'll try again.$1"/pause 200/warp Willy 26 21/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/speak Herbert "Hmm? What is it?"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 200/showFrame Herbert 0/pause 100/emote Herbert 32/move Willy 0 -14 0/move Willy 1 0 0/pause 200/speak Herbert "Ah! Willy! You took your time, didn't you chap?$3"/pause 100/emote Willy 16/pause 300/speak Willy "Sorry about that, Herbert. I was chasing this huge fish - a real whopper. Some oversized trout. You should have seen it!$1#$b#Oh, hello @! Didn't see you there.$1#$b#Anyways, he brought me into much deeper waters than I meant to go. Sorry about how long it took to get back.$2"/pause 200/speak Herbert "Oh don't worry about it, you're here now! Are you ready to head back into the sea?$3"/pause 200/speak Willy "Never been more ready.$1#$b#I'll see you later, @. I see you were keeping Herbert company.$1"/pause 200/faceDirection Herbert 1/speak Herbert "Goodbye, @. Thanks for helping me with my book!"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/move Willy 0 13 2/faceDirection farmer 2/move Herbert 0 13 2/pause 200/speak Herbert "I'll be back from the fishing trip in a few hours, @. I'll see you then!$3"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.977211/f Herbert 1500/t 900 1100/w sunny: jaunty/15 26/farmer 13 16 3 Herbert 15 26 0 Lewis 15 24 2/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 3/pause 200/emote Herbert 8/pause 200/speak Herbert "You look really uneasy in here, Lewis. What's wrong? I only wanted to get some cola.$1"/pause 200/speak Lewis "Problem? What problem? There's no problem. I would just prefer you to buy at Pierre's. Joja is not a trustworthy company.$2"/pause 200/speak Herbert "But grandfather - how could you say that? Your daughter and son-in-law both are Joja managers.$5#$b#They wouldn't work there if the company was untrustworthy.$1"/pause 200/move farmer 0 4 2/pause 200/speak Lewis "I know, I know, there's just a lot they aren't telling you.$2#$b#Sure, they're meeting with Joja boards around the world to discuss buisness on their trip...$2#$b#Probably earning lots... But you would know all about that wouldn't you?$2#$b#I heard you're planning on working for Joja for some experience before becoming a lawyer? Am I correct?$2"/pause 200/faceDirection Herbert 3/speak Herbert "Yes, you are correct, Grandfather.$1"/pause 100/faceDirection Herbert 0/speak Lewis "Then there's really no need for you to listen to my ramblings. Though, did you hear what they plan to do to my community centre?$2"/pause 200/speak Lewis "You see, my old community center, if it's not repaired they're going to take it.$w#$b#And I suppose... since your mother is not yet in my will, she has no say over this.$2#$b#Not that she'd want one.$2#$b#So what do you think about that? Hm Herbert?$2"/pause 500/emote Herbert 40/pause 200/speak Herbert "I know you care a lot about that community center. When I was younger I remember when it was open...$1"/pause 500/speak Lewis "But times change and you want to change with them, don't you? So you're just going to give them my community centre?$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/move farmer 0 3 2/move farmer -3 0 3/move farmer 0 4 2/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 100/faceDirection Herbert 3/speak Herbert "@? Can we help you?$1"/question fork1 "#Of course Herbert isn't going to do that! He wouldn't!#Well, maybe Herbert should. As you say, times change."/fork rejection/emote Herbert 16/speak Herbert "@! This doesn't have anything to do with you!$5#$b#I apologise for @'s behaviour. I don't understand why they're getting involed.$2"/pause 500/speak Lewis "Ah, you know the farmer? I'm glad to know you feel the same about this as I do.#$b#Herbert, I already explained all this to @. They support me.$1"/pause 500/speak Herbert "I'll consult with my parents about this. Maybe they'll know what Joja wants to do with the community centre. It might not be that bad.$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Herbert 2/pause 50/speak Lewis "Now wait a moment there, young man. Leave your parents out of this. They don't care about what I want."/pause 400/faceDirection Herbert 0/speak Herbert "But-$6"/pause 200/speak Lewis "I'm serious, Herbert.$2"/pause 200/speak Herbert "Alright Lewis. I won't.$2"/pause 200/speak Herbert "Let's go, @."/pause 200/move Herbert 0 1 2/move Herbert -7 0 3/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Lewis "Help us, @. Help me keep the community centre.$2"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.rejection: pause 500/speak Lewis "But @ - what about what we discussed -"/pause 500/speak Herbert "That's nice of you @, but this really doesn't involve you.$1"/pause 500/speak Lewis "It has everything to do with @, and with the residents of Pelican Town, Herbert.$5"/pause 200/speak Herbert "Look, Lewis, I'm not saying I'm just going to hand Joja the community centre. I just need to weigh up my options."/pause 300/speak Herbert "Mr Morris promised me a position at Joja if I gave them the community centre... with pay."/pause 500/faceDirection Herbert 2/pause 50/speak Lewis "But- you could find different means of work. You don't want to follow your parents-$2"/pause 400/faceDirection Herbert 0/speak Herbert "What?$6"/pause 200/speak Lewis "I- mean - Joja isn't what they're telling -  I'm sorry I didn't mean-$2"/pause 200/speak Herbert "Whatever, Lewis.$4"/pause 200/speak Herbert "Let's go, @."/pause 200/move Herbert 0 1 2/move Herbert -7 0 3/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Lewis "Help us, @. Please, Help save the community centre.$2"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.99912312/f Herbert 2500/t 1900 2100/w su: gusviolin/-1000 -1000/farmer 5 5 1 Gus 10 6 2 Herbert 9 5 3 Emily 9 17 2/skippable/showFrame 117/showFrame Herbert 32/positionOffset farmer 12 8/positionOffset Herbert -13 -9/animate Gus false true 723 16 17/viewport 7 4 true/pause 23000/stopAnimation Gus/pause 1000/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Herbert "Thank you Gus, that was incredible.$3"/pause 200/speak Gus "Thanks Herbert!$1"/move Gus 0 1 1/move Gus 1 0 2/move Gus 0 1 2/doAction 11 9/move Gus 0 3 1/move Gus 12 0 3 true/speak Herbert "So, Alex told me about this private room that I could reserve. I had no idea, but I wanted to see what it was like.$4"/pause 1000/emote Herbert 40/speak Herbert "Anyways, I just needed to see you again. And explain things.$1"/warp Emily 11 11 true/playSound woodyStep/move Emily 0 -4 3/move Emily -4 0 0/move Emily 0 -1 0/speak Emily "I've got a side-salad and chicken with Mr. @.^I've got a caesar salad with quiche for Miss @#$b#...and steak for Mr. Herbert.^And steak for Mr. Herbert"/playSound woodyHit/specificTemporarySprite joshDinner/speak Herbert "Thank you Emily, I'm sure this food will be exeptional.$3"/move Emily 4 0 2/move Emily 0 5 1/move Emily 11 0 1 true/speak Herbert "Anyways, @, about that rainy day when we were supposed to lunch.$1#$b#I'd like to formally apologise for putting you in such an awkward position, and for having to see me like that.$1"/playMusic musicboxsong/speak Herbert "You see, since that day I've had a lot of time to think and clear my head, and decide what future I want for myself now that there's no influences forced upon me.#$b#And yet, I just couldn't see a future that didn't have you in it.$1"/pause 600/speak Herbert "You have been the first person here, who has been there for me completely. You're just this... beautiful, exceptional woman who has completely changed me in the best way.#$b#You've given me a reason to look forward to the future.^When you first came here, you were the only person who actively wanted to hang and talk with me.#$b#I suppose feelings came really fast after that.$4^@, I've never been in love before and I have no idea what I'm doing.$1"/pause 800/speak Herbert "My grandfather warned me about this. He told me not to try to get into a relationship if I'm not in the correct state of mind.#$b#He doesn't want me to hurt about something else as well as my parents.$1#$b#But this is the first decision I've ever made that I know is right for me.$1#$b#Will you be mine?$4"/pause 400/emote Herbert 40/pause 600/question fork1 "#Yes! I feel the same way!#I'm so sorry Herbert... but I don't feel like that with you."/pause 400/fork rejectHerbert/speak Herbert "...$6#$b#R-really?$6#$b#After everything I've put you through... you're in love with me too?$4"/emote Herbert 32/pause 800/showFrame Herbert 34/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 400/showFrame Herbert 32/speak Herbert "This steak is incredible. Emily's done herself proud!$3#$b#Not in all the fancy restaurants I have dined in, has there ever been a steak so tender.$3"/pause 1000/speak Herbert "Shall we take a little moonlight stroll after we finish dinner?$3#$b#I think it would be a good idea.$3#$#But anyways, tuck in!$3/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.rejectHerbert: pause 100/playMusic none/shake Herbert 2000/emote Herbert 28/speak Herbert "...oh.$2#$b#I've made a complete fool of myself and ruined our relationship.$2"/pause 2000/speak Herbert "I'll pay for the meal. Enjoy the food - Emily spent a while on it. I think I'll just take my steak and leave you so I'm not intruding. Have a nice night.$2"/viewport move 1 1 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
